content: row 6 k2 slip 2 stitches to cn hold to back k2 then p2tog from cn p1 p2tog p2tog around 48 stitches pm place marker row 7 k4 p4 around 48 stitches row 8 slip 2 stitches to cn hold to back k2 then p2tog from cn p1 p2tog p1 around 36 stitches row 9 k2 p4 around 36 stitches row 10 k2 p2tog p2tog around 24 stitches row 11 k2 p2 around 24 stitches row 12 k2 p2tog around 18 stitches row 13 k2 p1 around 18 stitches row 14 k1 k2tog around 12 stitches row 15 k1 k2tog k1 around this row will only be repeated 3 times around instead of 6 times like the rest of the row 9 stitches campfire tales hat by lunebeam v1 4  page 2
